name: Galactic Junk Bay
description:
A game for "1-Button Jam 2020". I made the game. All the 3D models and art are made by Sam. (For more of her work: https://www.artstation.com/sam_ytsim)

Today is the first day of your job at Galactic Junk Bay. Your customers are from neighbor galaxies. You grab the stuff for the customer and try to earn some money. 

Please enjoy the weird and fun little adventure!

Control:

Space = Catch

Space (3 Times) = Shake

Music:

A Journey Awaits! (pbondoer from OpenGameArt.org)
